lead_paragraph: Nick Bonino looks the part. Thatchy beard that juts out well below his chinstrap. Nose a bit askew. The rugged forward has etched out a career making a living in tight spaces, putting his body in places on the ice that aren't for the meek.

headline.print_headline: Penguins Edge Sharks 3-2 in Game 1 of Stanley Cup Final
headline.main: Penguins Edge Sharks 3-2 in Game 1 of Stanley Cup Final
